vocabinfos.mediumDef:
: killed
1) slain, fatally wounded, pierced
1a) pierced, fatally wounded
1b) slain
Also means: cha.lal (חָלָל ": wounded" H2491H)
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
陽性名詞
1) 刺穿
1a) 刺穿, 重創
1b) 殺戮
形容詞
2) 玷污的, 蒙羞的, 邪惡的人
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
阳性名词
1) 刺穿
1a) 刺穿, 重创
1b) 杀戮
形容词
2) 玷污的, 蒙羞的, 邪恶的人

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
adj
1) (CLBL) profaned
1a) defiled, profaned (by divorce)
§ adj
1) (CLBL) profaned
1a) defiled, profaned (by divorce)
vocabinfos._es_Definition:
(1a) pi.   profanar; (1c) pi.   to profane = dishonor; (1d)
if. (reflexive)   to make use of, enjoy; (1f) pu.   participle: profaned; (1g) hif.   to profane; (1h)   to begin; (1i) hof.   to be begun; (2a) qal   to be mentally wounded; (2b) pi.   to wound; (2c) po.   to pierce; (2d) pu.   participle: pierced; (2e) po.   participle: pierced; (3)   to play the flute\1KI.1:40

(1a) pi.   profanar; (1c) pi.   to profane = dishonor; (1d)
if. (reflexive)   to make use of, enjoy; (1f) pu.   participle: profaned; (1g) hif.   to profane; (1h)   to begin; (1i) hof.   to be begun; (2a) qal   to be mentally wounded; (2b) pi.   to wound; (2c) po.   to pierce; (2d) pu.   participle: pierced; (2e) po.   participle: pierced; (3)   to play the flute\1KI.1:40
